author: Aznbeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: Champion & Skin Sale 3/28 - 3/31
text:
A new 50% off champ & skin sale  starts soon !  Mar 28th  thru  Mar 31st   you can snag  Arcade Hecarim  for 675 RP,  Dragon Fist Lee Sin  for 487 RP,  Hired Gun Lucian   for 487 RP,  Valkyrie Leona  for 260 RP,  Aatrox  for 487 RP,  Darius  for 440 RP,  Miss Fortune  for 395 RP and  Tryndamere  for 292 RP.
Continue reading for a better look at this sale's discounted skins!

Arcade Hecarim (675 RP) 
Dragon Fist Lee Sin (487 RP) 

Hired Gun Lucian (487 RP) 
Valkyrie Leona (260 RP) 

Sale & Skin Related News 

The  March Sales  and  April Sales   have been announced! Check out the link to get a peek of what's coming up for the next month!

Now through April 5th , t he new  Chroma for IP Sale  is running!

Make sure to check out the March Bundles and Early Sales ! The bundles last through 3/30 , but make sure you check out the early sales, before they end today !
